Plot: A young Amish boy is sole witness to a murder; policeman John Book goes into hiding in Amish country to protect him until the trial.
Title: Witness
Writer: William Kelley (story by), Pamela Wallace (story by), Earl W. Wallace (story by), Earl W. Wallace (screenplay by), William Kelley (screenplay by)
Actors: Harrison Ford, Kelly McGillis, Josef Sommer, Lukas Haas
